bug.author: ofirzaf
bug.description: According to BERT paper the token type of [CLS] token should be 0, however in sequence classification model it receives token type 1 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NervanaSystems/nlp-architect/blob/2f2eae3671b70a0e233ed77f385944f62ed127cf/nlp_architect/models/transformers/sequence_classification.py#L159-L160>https://github.com/NervanaSystems/nlp-architect/blob/2f2eae3671b70a0e233ed77f385944f62ed127cf/nlp_architect/models/transformers/sequence_classification.py#L159-L160</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: I think this was fixed with latest update to transformers
